extends java.lang.Object

selectMaze

public MazeData selectMaze(int i)
Method that selects one maze from database where `id` is 'i' . If there isn't open connection, returns empty MazeData object.

Parameters:
i - index in mazes table in database.
Returns:
returns one maze data as MazeData object.

selectMaze

public MazeData selectMaze(java.lang.String n)
Method that selects one maze from database where `name` is 'n'. If there isn't open connection, returns empty MazeData object.

Parameters:
n - maze's name.
Returns:
returns one maze data as MazeData object.
